data.eml:eml: An annotated catalogue of the epigeic and cave centipedes (Chilopoda) of Sardinia *

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zapparoli, Marzio (2009): An annotated catalogue of the epigeic and cave centipedes (Chilopoda) of Sardinia *. Zootaxa 2318: 56-168, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.192026
